solution_line_template: Tony got {num_degrees} degrees which each took {years_per_degree} years, for {num_degrees}*{years_per_degree}=<<{num_degrees}*{years_per_degree}={years_for_degrees}>>{years_for_degrees} years spent.

He then got his graduate degree, which was another {grad_degree_years} years added to the previous total, for {years_for_degrees}+{grad_degree_years}=<<{years_for_degrees}+{grad_degree_years}={total_years}>>{total_years} years in total.
